segments.text: Did you watch television last night , Charles ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It was a good game , wasn't it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I didn't watch the football match . I wanted to but my wife preferred to see the old film .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What a pity . It was quite exciting . Both teams played very well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It finished in a draw . What was the film like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It was quite good . But . I missed the beginning of it because I had to eat first .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , she didn't . After half an hour she stopped watching and started to read a book .
segments.speaker: S2
